my-description.introduce: Hi, my name is Emir Delic-Redzepagic.
my-description.company: Currently, I am working as a Software engineer in a company {0} in city Linz in Austria.
my-description.born: I am a Christmas Child and I was born on 24 December. I like to code and watch One Punch Man
my-description.source: Check my web site and hope you like it. Check the source {0} and if you wish to use it, it is free.
my-description.mail: If you want to contact me or hire me you can download my CV or contact me on my email {0}

skill-description.link: Check my Git repo if you want to learn, or to check some projects or just for fun.
skill-description.vue-description: I started working with Vue.js three years ago. My first JavaScript framework was React.js, but later I switched to Vue.js. I like them both. I can say that my skill level with Vue.js is really high and I enjoy creating applications with this framework.
skill-description.react-description: I started working with React.js four years ago. Version 16 has increased the efficiency and enjoyment of working with this framework. Also, after React Hooks came into use, this contributed to an even greater interest in this framework. I can say that my skill level with React.js is pretty high and I enjoy creating applications with this framework.
skill-description.vanilla-description: JavaScript is one of my favorite programming languages. Although sometimes it is weird to work with him and it is difficult to explain certain behaviors, when it comes to web development he is an integral part of it. Also, the use of forms from other programming languages has greatly facilitated and contributed to the speed of learning this programming language
skill-description.es-description: ECMAScript 6 (ES6) and the latest versions have made it much easier to work with Javascript as well as how to write code. My favorite feature is how to write functions and use the context of this. Also, the use of classes as well as inheritance and all other features that can be taken in back-end development.

portfolio-data.project_1: Information system for rental apartments. The system provides an overview of the apartments, which are available for hire, and the creation of the reservation. In addition to the user interface has an administration interface where you can carry out checks booking, then the apartment, and make adding staff to maintain the system. You can perform editing suites, reservation of sending messages to the user in the form of mail and create reports for work period in pdf format.
portfolio-data.project_2: Desktop application to control mobile car. It uses Bluetooth module HC-06. This project provides a compound of programming and microcontroller. The system has built-in sensors to detect the surrounding area and is able to make his own decisions about moving. It also has a video transmission.
portfolio-data.project_3: This application offers the possibility of converting the image to a bitmap format, then compare people that have taken an image to the base image in the database. The software for the detection and classification of images allows the comparison of characteristic points of the face and on the basis that, the search is done. If a person is in the database is printed its data stored in the database. It also has built-in software to detect face, eyes, nose and image editing software, a change resolution color brightness, contrast, rotation and more.
portfolio-data.project_4: Information system for car rental. The system provides an overview of cars that are available for hire and the creation of the reservation. In addition to the user interface has an administration interface where you can carry out checks reservations, then the car, and make adding users,  new cars, as well as the creation of a contract.
portfolio-data.project_5: Websites for control of video surveillance.  It allows you to view two independent cameras. Also in the programming language Matlab is done a desktop application that also offers a view of the cameras and control motoring management of cameras.
portfolio-data.project_6: Web service for data collection from remote locations. Allows the collection of temperature and humidity by using a microcontroller. The data is sent to the server and is stored in the database. Once a day is sent data of maximum and minimum temperature the user via e-mail using SMTP.
portfolio-data.project_7: Mobile applications for the control of a microcontroller. The first view is intended for the control elements inside the apartment or house, as well as the business environment. Another view enables speech recognition and on the basis of words or commands performs a specific action. The third view collects data from the microcontroller and executes a graphical representation of the same. All applications are connected with the Bluetooth module on the microcontroller and thus execute actions for which they have been prescribed.
